_header: In His being He is God in persons three
Subjects: sermons, verse in; Christ, attributes of
_description: Three lines on Christ in a Latin sermon

CULIi38.Transcription:
In hys bey[n]g h[e] [i]s god in personis treIn hys doy[n]g he is
                    curteys & freAnd in hys thechyng þer may be no trewar
                    be
CULIi38.Editions:
Erb,  Peter C. 
             “Vernacular Material for Preaching in MS Camb. Univ. Lib.
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Mediaeval Studies
         33 (1971): 63-84: 67.
